item.title: enabling VNC from SSH on OSX
item.description:
I have a Late 2008 MacBook Pro in the house, and SSH is enabled on it. I usually leave it on when in work. Anyway, SSH is enabled, but VNC access is not… I found the following command on Ryan’s Tech Notes allowing you to enable it though SSH:

{% gist 4170122 %}

** NOTE ** Change mypasswd to your own password!!!

If you need to disable it, use the following:

{% gist 4170129 %}

Also, of note, I am using RealVNC client for Windows to connect.
